response.overview: EMI – 0946 3 48660 2 6, EMI – 348 6602 CD, Album, Remastered DVD, DVD-Audio, DVD-Video, Multichannel, NTSC, Remastered, Stereo UK & Europe 2006 Rock Pop Rock DVD disc has album in DVD-Audio 5.1 surround and 2.0 stereo in 96KHz/24bit advanced resolution, Dolby digital Surround & stereo sound. The DVD disc also includes a Photo Gallery. Video Content: DVDVideo-1 and DVDVideo-2 first collected on Storytelling Giant, EMI/Picture Music International video MVP9911623. Screen Design and Animations: Andrew Thomas for Thomas & Friends Productions
